newsitem.title: USA: Payless ShoeSource June same-store sales up.
newsitem.headline: Payless ShoeSource June same-store sales up.

text.p: Payless ShoeSource Inc said Thursday that same-store sales for the five weeks ended July 5 rose 9.5 percent.
Total sales for the period increased 16 percent to $295.8 million from $254.9 million.

Total sales for the five months of fiscal 1997 were $1.18 billion, up 10.7 percent from $1.07 billion a year ago. Results for 1997 include sales from Parade of Shoes stores as of March 10, the day the stores were acquired.
Same-store sales for the year to date period rose 7.5 percent.
